price: Oni govore: "Naša su srca okorjela!" A nije tako, nego je Allah njih prokleo zbog nevjerovanja njihova, a malo je njih koji vjeruju.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ قُلُوبُنَا غُلۡفُۢۚ بَل لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ فَقَلِيلٗا مَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū qulūbunā ghul'fun bal laʿanahumu al-lahu bikuf'rihim faqalīlan mā yu'minūna
